rules_text:
{BG}: Cult Apprentice becomes a Human Druid with base power and toughness 2/2.
{BG}{BG}: If Cult Apprentice is a Druid, put a deathtouch counter on it and it becomes a Human Druid Mutant with base power and toughness 3/3.
{BG}{BG}{BG}: If Cult Apprentice is a Mutant, it gains “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand” until end of turn.
